response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance and the fact that it aligns perfectly with your needs, I believe it would be a perfect fit for you. I am offering this product to you for $14,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic worth of the product and my desire to recover its full value. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a special chance to own something truly remarkable at a competitive price. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to hearing your response soon.", "product_price": 14000}
